availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Thomas Drury (Union County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Union County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of J. Drury and Lydia Drury. Married to Martha E. Drury. Father of Ann E. Drury, Humphrey Drury, George Drury, Vera C. Drury, Mary E. Drury, John T. Drury, and William N. Drury. Farmer in Union County in 1850.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union, District 2, p. 499A-B.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union, Uniontown, p. 72.
Find A Grave, "William Thomas Drury (December 24, 1834-October 20, 1918)," Memorial #92076683, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/92076683 (accessed May 9, 2018).
